summary: The women's long jump final was a part of the 28th Summer Universiade in 2015. In this track and field event, athletes try to jump as far as they can from a starting point. It's one of the "horizontal jumps," along with the triple jump. The long jump has a long history, dating back to the ancient Olympic Games. It became an Olympic event for men in 1896 and for women in 1948.
title: Long jump
